website_summaries.verdict: A 2-compartment cooler backpack that gives you a place for dry foods as well as a cooler space to keep your drinks cold.
pros: Includes a bottle opener on the strap
Extra storage pocket for dishes and water bottles
cons: Because there are 2 compartments, this cooler will not fit as much cool storage as others

customer_reviews.title: Awesome picnic backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is perfect for picnics off the beaten path. There are four convenient compartments. The largest insulated compartment (bottom) is not quite tall enough to hold wine bottles vertically but they fit sideways or in the drink pockets on the outside. The top compartment has a zippered mesh pocket on the inside and a hidden pocket that can be accessed from the top near the handle. The larger front compartment has three inner pockets that I store utensils and a small cutting board in. The outer front pocket holds flat items like napkins. The straps are padded and adjustable with a bottle opener on one and a stretchy zippered pocket on the other (big enough for iPhone).
customer_reviews.author: M Ska

customer_reviews.title: ... backpack for a couple weeks and so far it's perfect. I use it as my lunch bag for ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this backpack for a couple weeks and so far it's perfect. I use it as my lunch bag for work. I work in industrial construction so i needed something to not only carry my cold food but also snacks and other things like sunblock, battery pack, etc. Plenty of good sized pockets
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bag hasn’t made my day so much easier.
customer_reviews.text: This bag blew away my expectations, it’s is made of strong quality material and I probably rank it as the best investment I’ve made for bodybuilding and traveling for work. All my meals, drinks, utensils and even my seasonings fit into it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mikeal.fit

customer_reviews.title: All that I hoped for and more!
customer_reviews.text: I've been lugging around a soft sided cooler and a diaper bag for the past four months. This is sooo much easier! The design provides excellent weight distribution. When my cooler bag was full, it felt heavy and irritating on the shoulder. When I fill this Tourit backpack just as full, plus my diaper bag stuff, a few toys and a bottle of water for me, it feels like I'm carrying an empty backpack! The insulation is also much better than my old cooler bag and I love all the extra pockets!!
customer_reviews.author: Wanderso

customer_reviews.title: This cooler is amazing. On the first glance at it
customer_reviews.text: Order it on Friday, got it on Sunday and try it today. This cooler is amazing. On the first glance at it, I just knew that I have made a wise decision -- the color and design style are even better than the one shown in picture and the space is used efficiently :-) Then I tried it today in Boston (whereof the winter is quite enjoyable if you like 3 snow storms in two weeks, LOL), it really save my hands from the freezing wind. BTW, the food is still warm after going through the long journey at freezing temperature for about 1 hours. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kaizhen Zhang

customer_reviews.title: My new briefcase
customer_reviews.text: Cold items in the bottom, needs two ice packs on hot days, my Stanley food thermos and dry goods up top, coffee on the side cup holder pocket, utensils and protein bars on the other cup holder, and my iPad in the front zipper pocket. I won a free $300 otter box backpack cooler and I like this one better!
customer_reviews.author: jeepaxle

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Within 2 months the zippers derailed and when I tried to return it under their lifetime warranty after I shoes the sales receipt I was ignored ... This product is overrated
customer_reviews.author: sergio martinez

customer_reviews.title: Working great!
customer_reviews.text: So far it is working great! Used it at Disney to take our food/snacks and also any extra things we needed. Lots of room for plenty of food and also extra items you may need for a picnic or anything. One thing it needs is a center strap/clip to help hold the weight across your chest and not just your shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: NaturallyMama

customer_reviews.title: Best cooler backpack around.  Great for breastmilk storage!
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness I purchased this backpack for my breast pumps and milk storage! The insulated portion is amazing and definitely holds more than milk. I pack my lunch and snacks in it, as well as two large ice coolers. They last for hours and hours so on long days my milk stays cold until I get home. If I’m not using it for my breastmilk, I use it for outings to vineyards or picnics. I can’t say enough about this backpack. It is durable, easy to clean and simple.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: The dimensions listed in a previous review were pretty accurate and I was looking for a larger bag ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag was surprisingly bigger than I expected. The dimensions listed in a previous review were pretty accurate and I was looking for a larger bag to bring food to sports tournaments, field trips, etc. I have tried it with ice in it and it did not leak or sweat although the bottom would get cold. The top compartment was pretty big to take quite a few snacks and the other zippered pouches hold quite a bit too. Overall extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cristal Leonard

customer_reviews.title: this is a great work cooler/luchbox
customer_reviews.text: Great for work you can set 20oz bottles and 32oz bottles upright in the bottom. their is plenty of pockets for other crap you wanna pack, the shoulder straps are sturdy and their arent the useless extra straps you dont need any way. not a ton of room in the top compartment but enough for a decent lunch. they ought to pay me for saying all this but its true and im bored enough to type it.(update its now mid July and its still the best )
customer_reviews.author: B. W. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy A Tourit Cooler Backpack when I saw a guy at work who had one. Best decision I have made. It has Plenty of Storage for my lunch and keeps it cold enough throughout the day. It also has enough pockets and storage for my personal items that I bring to work with me! I was skeptical about the zippers at first but, so far they are still working fine. I definitely recommend this Backpack Cooler!!
customer_reviews.author: Todd P

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I'm a flight attendant and I use this backpack as an alternative to the company issued shoulder worn cooler/lunch at. I love it i have tons of room for food and enough room to put other personal items. The only issue I've had is that i had a spill from some food while the bag was stored on its side and it leaked out from the zipper section. So I learned a lesson don't store it out its side otherwise it wouldn't leaked out which is better than my old travel pro cooler that leaked from the bottom line section.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Adams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: First impression: awesome Haven’t used it yet, but upon initial inspection the product seems well made with a huge compartment for a full day of food- insulated- and also various other compartments for storage of personal items. Pens, cell phone, tablet, etc. big top pocket for a coat or fleece. Whatever you bring to work for a full day, this will be able to handle it. I added a container to the bottom insulated section, not sure what the dimensions are, but it fits in perfectly and it creates a lot of rigidity. Not needed- but adds to the perfection. Highly recommend off of first impressions.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: Using as a breast pump bag
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use as a lunch/breastpump bag. I fit a spectra s2 in the top with the Medela portable battery pack. Ice packs, pump parts and bottle in the lower. Front pocket have lots of room for accessories and side pockets comfortably fit a standard water bottle, small rolled blanket etc
customer_reviews.author: Ann K

customer_reviews.title: One of the best cooler bags on the market
customer_reviews.text: We love this because it allows us to keep our non perishables dry in a separate zipper compartment. The cooler part is truly water proof which is nice and the side bottle holders will fit my Yeti rambler bottle and the front pouch is great for napkins and silverware. We are out and about a lot and with a 2 year old we love this! We use freezer packs and will keep the cooler area cold for 12 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Acklin

customer_reviews.title: My favorite backpack/lunchbox EVER! I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this cooler backpack! Its exactly what I was looking for! Have been using it daily for work to take my lunch for almost 3 weeks now and it keeps the ice packs cold for 10+ hours! Great amounts of storage for my needs and is holding up well. Zippers are high quality and the liner of the cooler section seems to be quite tough. Would highly recommend this backpack to anyone looking for a cooler bakpack!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for a Work lunch bag!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is amazing!!! . well thought out and perfect amount of room for food... also perfect amount of room for other things. I use this bag for work... I absolutely love it! This bag wasn’t designed for work use but I highly encourage for its use in the work environment......I would even pay a little more for a bag made for work use....... But all in all.... this bag is excellent. And I would buy it again. I also recommend it to the ppl I work with who ask about it. :)
customer_reviews.author: C. O.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cooler backpack, excellent quality and great value
customer_reviews.text: I looked up over 30 of this type of backpack for vacation, read description and prices. This was the best value. It has waterproof section plus separate section for food, also zippered outside pocket big enough for iPad and phone. Mesh pocket for water bottles and large sturdy straps that don't dig into shoulders. It's very well made. Perfect for hiking, boating, picnics, beach, poolside and taking to horse races.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Keeps things cool. Two compartments are perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Such a great cooler bag. Exactly what we needed for a Disneyland/Universal trip. It kept our drinks and treats cool all day. I love the two different compartments. The only thing that was weird was that even though we had ice packs instead of ice, the stuff we put in the front pocket would get damp (definitely from condensation). Thought that was weird but it wasn’t a deterrent from using the bag in the future. Would definitely recommend this product. Can’t wait for more reasons to use it.
customer_reviews.author: goan

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Man just when I thought this was a good bag the zipper handle snapped! Ehhh got this in october and looks like it wants to fall apart on me already! Still works but quality isn’t there! I would tell you this is still a decent product but I’m a mailman and things get a little rough and this probably wOnt make it long!
customer_reviews.author: scott z

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for working festivals... I felt like i found the bag i needed. I was wrong, this bag is not waterproof at all. The first time i wore it, the water from the ice dripped all down my back the first day. It was infuriating that I felt I researched to find the right bag, and nothing. This bag is a huge disappointment. I only used it once. I'm gingntocsend it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great durable backpack cooler.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this backpack cooler for a little over 2 months and it has been very durable and sturdy. I'm a package driver for one of the big companies and this backpack takes some abuse and heat ( temperature wise ) in the back of the truck. And it doesn't have a fray or thread out place on it. The compartment on top is very useful for dry goods while the main compartment below helps to keep it cool with my ice packs and drinks/cooler. The only drawback for me is the liner, once the ice packs start to thaw out the condensation/moisture tends to seep through to the bottom of the pack making it wet.
customer_reviews.author: DucaTT

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy - reviewing after a few months use
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this for a few months now and it’s been very sturdy. My husband uses it for lunch and to carry heavy items inside as he is in law enforcement. He carries it by the top hook and it hasn’t teared at all. We had a Coleman previously for over a year and it had started to tear at the top so we will see with time how this one holds up but so far so good. Material is thick and keeps contents cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: I work in the field and have not only my lunch to haul around but other items as well like computer tablet, gloves, hard hat etc....I would have to walk out to my equipment with my hands full before I went with this lunch back pack. insulated area is large for lots of lunch and drinks. plenty of compartments for misc items i need throughout the day. Handy back pack style leaves hands free to carry anything that doesn't fit in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product👍 And even better company!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this cooler backpack almost 2 years ago. And used it everyday for work and it held up great and holds a lot of food and drinks, plus your wallet phone and many other daily essentials. Well a week ago the cooler compartment zipper broke and would not stay zipped up. I emailed them a picture and description of the problem. They quickly responded and sent me a brand new bag free of charge! It’s really gratifying as a consumer when a company stands behind they’re product/guarantee. Thanks Tourit for a great product and even better customer satisfaction. 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Bman-g

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well with daily use
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product 4 months and use it every weekday for work to keep things cold for work and ice packs cold for after work (for an arthritic horse) Also took it to a trip to Yosemite. Food stayed cold during hiking trips. The design keeps the backpack well balanced and light. I'm able to fit a change of clothes in the top compartment. The bottom cooler compartment is roomy. The very top zipper is useful for a phone, sunglasses or keys...there's also a mesh inner zipper
customer_reviews.author: Laurel A. Houle

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I used it for our trip to Disney World and Universal Studios. It kept every thing cold if water was too spill in the cooler part, it did not leak out unless it tilted over. Then the water would come from the zipper, but not at a super fast pace. it kept every thing cold/cool from 0600-1900. We use it, prep it and sit it in our car, whenever we are going out for more than a 8 hour time frame because my childrenalways want a snack and they drink so much water and its cheaper than buying single water bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Japryce

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful backpack. Well made and delivers as advertised. My daily backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I tried Igloo and went through 2 in 6 months. They fell apart. I found this backpack and thought I would give it a try. I use this backpack everyday for work and am extremely impressed with it. The first one lasted about a year then the zipper to the main compartment gave out. I bought the same one again, but different color. I absolutely love it. Plenty of room and functional pockets. Keeps my food cold and can carry everything I need for the day. Sturdy construction and well made. I recommend this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Boles

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: I use mine to travel to and from work on my motorcycle, I bought some of those meal prep 2 sided containers and I can fit 3 of those in there plus a drink and on the top portion I can fit all my snacks and personal items like headphones , wallet , keys etc. plus even more room in the front pouches for note pads and pens. basically everything u might need if your traveling light. I love the thing Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Awesome backpack! I took it to Hawaii and had all my snacks and drinks in the lower section. Then I used the upper section to store my son extra clothes (great alternative for a diaper bag as well!). The front pocket was big enough to store items as well. Great product I would highly recommend definitely!
customer_reviews.author: TMC.CHA

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cooler Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Ok quality. Small 2 inch seam on the back was ripped upon arrival. Too much hassle to return or exchange. I just sewed it, so it was fine. I like all the different compartments. I used ice packs to keep my drinks and snacks cold for a few hours. The mesh pocket on the strap intended for a cell phone was too small so I used it to hold a travel size hand sanitizer that I frequently use.
customer_reviews.author: cmav1122

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this backpack/cooler. We’ve used it primarily for hitting the pool this summer. Has kept our drinks and treats perfectly chilled for several hours (with frozen ice packs). Top section has plenty of space for sunscreen, keys, a book, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Schwadette

customer_reviews.title: Man Work Lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for husband for work in the refinery. He was tired of lugging his big Engle cooler. He LOVES it! Holds more than cooler did, no more one sided shoulder hold and his hands are free! Bottom kept his food cold w ice packs in 100+° heat. Plenty room in top for extra stuff. Very much worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Sissie

customer_reviews.title: More durability needed (Railroad worker)
customer_reviews.text: I was initially very happy with this product. I used it as my everyday lunch bag for work. I carry a few things in it so the size was perfect. However after only a year of use the zippers and tracks broke off. So a little disappointed it didn't last longer.
customer_reviews.author: genaro gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Steel Mill Worker Approved
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boyfriend who works in a steel mill to replace the typical box cooler on a strap. He loves it. Easier to carry daily. Snacks stay up at the top unsmashed. Electronics goes in the front pockets. Doesn't need the bottle opener so he uses that to hold his key clip/keys. Never has to dig for them.
customer_reviews.author: simplymeinmo

customer_reviews.title: Yes!! Love it!!.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect and worked exactly like I needed to. This was for the husband for going to work. He has to carry his clothes and foox into work. He works at a steel mill and needes somthing that would hold everything but also work in the elements and this did it he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie

customer_reviews.title: New travel backpack
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have used my old college JanSport backpack for everything! Baseball games, theme park trips, travel trips, playing spots/gym bag. Always trying to shove a small cooler or keep drinks cold. I am so thankful that I found this backpack before our trip to Hawaii. Hiking was so much better with this backpack. I love that there are extra compartments for dry items.. phones, wallets, keys, plates, napkins. No issues with leaking and the bag survived Hawaii :) hikes, beaches, and all the fun stuff.
customer_reviews.author: LizzyR

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a recent beach trip, only found out that the beach didn’t allow alcohol so this was a nice way to conceal my “cooler.” Waterproof enough, it hasn’t grown any mold yet. My only drawbacks are I wish it had a drain at the bottom or side of the bag where the cooler part is instead of having to turn the entire book bag upside down to drain. And it would be nice if the outside bottom was made out of a different/smoother material than the rest of the bag. I set it in sand and it got sand in every little crevice, I imagine it will do the same with dirt, dust, and everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cooler with pockets for other items
customer_reviews.text: This is great backpack cooler. It has pockets for other items. I tried a lot of backpack coolers and this was definitely the best one of them all. It was outside all day in the heat at baseball tournament and it worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Primetime

customer_reviews.title: Best bag for traveling on a bus.
customer_reviews.text: Used it riding the Mega Bus this past weekend. I kept my food and frozen water bottles on the bottom. On the top I put my carry ons and my personal stuff on the top pocket. Only the bottom has two zipper, the rest is one. Really wish the top compartment had a 2nd zipper but other then that it was the perfect carry on. I sat it on my lap with the zippers facing me, and everything was easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Be Lee

customer_reviews.title: Is it really a lifetime guarantee??
customer_reviews.text: This says there is a lifetime guarantee, and to just email the seller if there's any issues. But I see no email and it says my return window is closed. It's a pretty good backpack. But both zippers somehow broke. I would have hoped for it to be a little stronger given the price. Or at the very least a way to contact the seller....
customer_reviews.author: Jds

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, needs better zippers, good support
customer_reviews.text: Was loving this backpack. We bought it for a Disney trip in January, and it worked great. However, here we are in September, and 2 zippers have now failed. In defense of the bag it did become our daily go to bag with 2 toddlers, but I feel it should have lasted longer. Update (Oct 2019): submitted the issue through the Tourit website and they provided a new bag. Same as the old one but at least the were responsive. Changing from 3 to 4 stars for their customer service effort.
customer_reviews.author: Dave & Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great Fathers Day Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for fathers day. He used to carry a big, bulky lunch box to work and hated it. He has only been using this for maybe a week or two but he loves it so far! It seems sturdy and has plenty of space to store all of his stuff. We also plan to use it on our trip to the zoo and at the lake. I especially like the bottle opener that came attached to one of the straps. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: How did I not know a bag like this existed until now?
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a total GAME CHANGER!!! It fits so much food and is the perfect carry on for the plane. I packed so much food and everything stayed pretty cool for not having ice. I love all the pockets and the design was perfect for wet/dry items. I would recommend to anyone that travels or hikes and like to carry their own food.
customer_reviews.author: thefitwanderwoman

customer_reviews.title: Average bag w/ lots of pockets
customer_reviews.text: This held up nice and had decent room for a mini cooler. I gave it a 3 because it doesn't keeps its form inside the cooler meaning if its wet inside its hard to keep it upright inside to add contents. The straps are decent and i really liked all the pockets for dry stuff. its mostly meant for two people.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Top 3 best purchases of 2018 thus far
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my lunch for work but am so excited for all its possibilities. Best zipper seal I've seen on any insulated pack/sack. The amount and varied types of pockets is awesome. My 20 and my 40oz hydroflasks fit perfectly in the mesh side pouches. I didnt even notice the bottle opener attached to the strap when I ordered it. Top 3 fave purchases of 2018 so far. The price is stellar, the look, the design. Damn son.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Sueper

customer_reviews.title: Roomy
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room in the cooler section of the bag and the other pockets as well. Comfortable, would rate 5 stars if the upper compartment was water resistant. Walked 1/4 mile this morning from the bus to work and everything in the top compartment is still wet 8 hrs later. It was raining pretty steady, but I had an umbrella as well. *** Update: Barely under 8 months of use and the zipper broke... just dropped to two stars for me!
customer_reviews.author: k cull

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: got this as a work cooler for the boyfriend and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Love the backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love the backpack, but the stitching started to break down the first week we were using it. I fixed it myself, but at this price point I was really surprised to see it breaking down so quickly. Maybe we got a dud.
customer_reviews.author: doxiemommie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Breast Pump Bag!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack makes for a great breast pump bag for a working mom!! The top section has plenty of room for the medela pump and cords. The cooler is spacious and can easily fit 4-6 bottles with ice packs. I’m very pleased with this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Laur-tastic

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof, Sturdy, Lots of Room.
customer_reviews.text: Love It, Took it to Europe, Stood up like a champ for everything I needed it for, from toting drinks and food, to shirts and souvenir purchases. Loved It!!
customer_reviews.author: LZapoli

customer_reviews.title: It’s just an O.K bag.
customer_reviews.text: It’s an OK back pack cooler. I use this everyday to pack my lunches for work. Thinking it would keep my cold packs cooler longer, it doesn’t. The top storage area is good. But you’ll need to pack the bottom cooler part in order to support the top, if not the top gets too heavy and flops over. Won’t sit straight up with out leaning it against something.. The overall feel, wearability and look is what I like about it, but I’d rather have a stout bag vs looks. And honestly I don’t see this bag keeping things cool long enough if you were to go on a hike or something out doors.
customer_reviews.author: shaun

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job the top compartment should be more sealed so it can be used for cold stuff. It has good room i use it for work and it works. I do wish the bottom part had a hard liner for it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Several zippered pockets. There is one hidden on the left shoulder strap. Seems well made. Only time will tell. This replaced a high quality OGIO which is discontinued so i figured i would give this a try. Lighter than the ogio and smaller zippers but will serve its purpose none the less
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: This product may do a good job retaining cold temperatures when using ice packs. However it’s poorly manufactured! The zipper tabs started to come off after a month of regular use, then after two months the zipper to the cooler compartment was completely undone! This pack is cheaply made. The money you’d spend on this product would be better off used on a better quality cooler.
customer_reviews.author: jcruz

customer_reviews.title: Ready to take it on a trip
customer_reviews.text: I plan to use the backpack for my carry-on for a trip so we will have a cooler at our destination. I've used it here and there to carry drinks and I'm impressed with how cold the drinks stay with just bagged ice. An iPad fits in the front pocket. It is comfortable to wear and seems like it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Molley C.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, bad handle
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my lunch bag and has been absolutely fantastic, until the primary handle at the top ripped after less than 3 months. I’m hoping to hear from the manufacturer because this concerns me for the longevity of the bag. Otherwise it would be a 5 star item.
customer_reviews.author: GL Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Cooling
customer_reviews.text: Excelent and very useful thing for hot summer days. Also, seller is very profesional and excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Xy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It is great just as is. It keeps my food cold during the hot steamy souther summer and has room for all the items I need during the day. I am looking for a way to divide the cooler section so that I can add seperste heavy items from of soft items. As I move about a lot and sometimes desert is a little messed up. This is just a small thing.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding.
customer_reviews.text: Great design, perfect size, very convenient. The material is high quality and the insulated compartment works well. The only thing that could be improved is the sewing but that's not a big deal. I've been using this backpack everyday for work, I love it. Much gratitude!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Nice for Travel
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack! We use it for picnics and to travel anywhere outside to keep our food and drinks cold. I would advise using cold packs instead of ice just in case of any accidental spills. I can not state whether it leaks or not, as I have never attempted to put ice in it. I like the extra top and side pockets. Lots of room to hold all of your stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting cooler
customer_reviews.text: This thing did exactly what it said it was going to do. We bought it for our trip to disney world so we would have to pay those ridiculous drink and food prices. It held up all day in the Florida sun. I got the pack hung up several time on different things and it never even snagged once. I would say if your a hard core hiker you might want something just a little bit larger but it worked perfectly for us.
customer_reviews.author: karluvonne

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Keeps my lunch and drinks cold. I have kept items in my bag for 4hours so far. The top compartment is nice for snacks and personal items. Overall quality is great. Have had zero issues with it so far. Highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Needs better zippers
customer_reviews.text: The zippers break easy on this then making it impossible to use. Invest in better zippers
customer_reviews.author: Diego Aviles

customer_reviews.title: Works great! tons of compartments
customer_reviews.text: We bought this backpack for our Disney trips. It has so many useful pockets. My husband who drives trucks for a living likes it so much he’s been using it instead of his cooler lunch box. We use ice packs and it keeps everything cold and in good tempartue.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the style of the backpack, but when I put some ice in the insulated section and it started to melt..... it leaked all over the place. Like I said, style is great and it seemed like good quality, but it is NOT LEAK PROOF AT ALL!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie_O

customer_reviews.title: This is a large lunch bag but I use it for other things.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bag for almost a year. And it's still holding up to every day use. It keeps my water cold all day when you use an ice pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for work. He is a ironworker it's very sturdy and holds alot of stuff. However the iner lining has already tore in less than two months n
customer_reviews.author: Shanda

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler on your back
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler for travelling, it has enough room for drinks and snacks. We are able to ride our bikes and not feel the impact of the ice running down your back like some other coolers. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Loved the size of the cold compartment. Was perfect to take to the hospital for drinks and snacks while pregnant.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’m a Nurse and I love this back pack. Plenty of room for cold and dry snacks . I pack my lunch at 530 am. And everything is still cold at 2 pm. I use the front ouch for extra pins and stuff. Much prefer it over the mdmp bag I had before it
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Glad we bought this.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for trips to the zoo, museum, park, etc...Big enough to hold drinks, food, utensils and not be too heavy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: JDorsey7

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack lunch cooler my husband purchased for me. It is easier to transport everything in this bag each day.
customer_reviews.author: Wright, Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps food pretty cool but it leaks. I bent down to pick something off the floor and all this ice cold water from inside it poured on my back. If it weren’t for that I’d give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: saab227

customer_reviews.title: Light weight!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight yet has great storage. Only complaint is you are not supposed to use ice as it will leak but use ice packs instead. A little annoying but otherwise it is exactly what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Thumble28

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch bag.
customer_reviews.text: I use mine for work, I work in the woods and for summer it did great kept my water cold for a long time. Not that winter is coming wish the top part was insulated so it would be able to keep some hot food warm but no complains here.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe barragan

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great. It’s spacious, sturdy and I’m very glad I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: bootsbabe

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke before actual use.
customer_reviews.text: Cute compact pack back that did a great job holding food cold for a day max. We used it during our trip to Iceland! There’s a number of pockets that we could use for other items, but the handle broke at the airport during TSA check, so it broke the first day of use.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Lazau

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like to complain, this review is more out of disappointment given I really like the backpacks design and features. Unfortunately, within 5 days the inner seam has already separated inside pocket. I have not used it rigorously or overloaded it. Primarily a few pens, phone and a few light lunch items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok backpack. Be careful with the zippers.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this backpack for around 7 months and it’s been fine up until now. The zipper broke off today so now I have to be careful with the other zippers so they don’t break as well, they seem like they will break easily. Also, if you have an ice pack or ice in here, it won’t leak, but the bottom will get super wet and will get whatever the backpack is sitting on wet.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: best fiancé gift ever
customer_reviews.text: I got this gift for my fiancé for Christmas and he is absolutely obsessed with it. Clear style and nice quality!
customer_reviews.author: michael pivec

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack. Cooler portion holds water from melted ice without leakage as long as bag stays upright. If flipped it will leak out of the zipper, which was expected but found out by accident. There is plenty of space to store other items not in ice. I have stored some water and other beverages with a few ice packs in this on a very warm day,90-100*f, and they remained cool all day.
customer_reviews.author: Josh M

customer_reviews.title: Spacious compartments but faulty zipper
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack cooler. It's spacious and holds plenty of snacks and drinks. However, the zipper broke within the first week of use.
customer_reviews.author: RCoop

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size (FYI....we are only a family of 3) . Everything stays cold. Used it a ton already. Great for riding bikes to a picnic or the pool. Love all the different compartments. Best purchase we have made in a while
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wear/carry
customer_reviews.text: We took this on an 8 hour flight to and from Hawaii and hiking/site seeing everyday while there. It held enough food for four people along with drinks. It keep everything in the chill compartment cold for at least 12 hours if not longer. Will use this again for future trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convienent and wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for our sand volleyball league. Cold beer in the bottom and a dry place in the top to keep keys and wallets.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Insulated Cooler Backpack is great for hikes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go on long single day hikes. I can put my water, other beverages, food, and a bunch of misc items with room to spare. Seems to be made well, I've only used it 3 times, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry H.Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I bought it and soon after, everyone was asking me questions about it and buying it too! It’s great for having young ones because I can keep their snacks and milk cold while out on the go! Definitely buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Bag Came Ripped
customer_reviews.text: Bag came ripped on the side. It will get progressively worse overtime and then just become a giant rip. I don’t have time to ship it back. Just gonna count my losses and invest in something better next time. (Probably an easy fix, I just don’t have time to send it back and wait for replacement. We got this for our beach trip in 3 days)
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Jones

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my bag
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my bag. I got this because my meal prep bag was too small for all my stuff. I found this bag online and decided to check out and see if Amazon had it. I use this bag everyday and i could not be more happy with my purchase. All the compartments are easily accessible and its so sleek looking.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last long. The zippers broke after 5 months of use. My husband was using this as a cooler for work and really liked it. It did keep his lunch cold.
customer_reviews.author: S Payne

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE.
customer_reviews.text: This ice chest pack is AMAZING we never leave home with out it. Perfect for 2 boys that love love love milk. It can hold both bottles and a half gallon of milk. And diapers and wipes fit in the top. Cell phones and womans wallet fit in also.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor waldron

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to take to my sons wrestling tournaments. This is perfect to pack drinks and snacks. There are plenty of compartments to hold everything we need.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Backpack is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I work at a prison and this backpack has made my life easier. We are only allowed to bring one bag so I'm able to use the insulated part for my lunch and all the other compartments for gloves, umbrella, and whatever else I need. One day it was poring rain and my backpack dried up super quick and nothing got wet inside.
customer_reviews.author: Felisha M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: One of the best bags purchased for my job! Just enough compartments, easy clean and keeps my food/drinks cold or frozen almost all day in hot Texas!
customer_reviews.author: La'rissa Dedrick

customer_reviews.title: Solid, spacious cooler.
customer_reviews.text: This thing can carry plenty of booze. Obviously gets a little heavy but its very manageable to move with when its loaded. The top pouch is a nice place to store things like sunscreen, cups, or whatever else.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for vacations.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have taken it on two trips. We were able to take this to the beach and save money by bringing our own beer to the resort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very practical
customer_reviews.text: This is well made and very practical. My son uses this to pack his lunches in for work.
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a cooler that is great for traveling then look no further. The product has compartments for wet and dry materials. The only issue that I found was the leaking through the zipper. Keep the backpack rightside up and it will meet all your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Dolan

product_meta.title: TOURIT Insulated Cooler Backpack Double Deck Light Lunch Backpack with Cooler Compartment for Men Women to Work, Picnics, Hiking, Beach, Park or Day Trips
feature_bullets: Material: Water Repellent Oxford+High-density Foam+Leak-proof Liner

Lightweight yet Durable: Made of leak resistant, durable fabric, best light cooler lunch backpack for daily trips, picnics, road/ beach trips, hiking, camping, fishing, cycling, perfect gift for men and women
Cooling Performance: High-Density Insulation material inside of the insulated backpacks to keep food warm or cool for 16 hours (numbers will vary)
Leak Resistant: A thick layer of insulation cotton Eco-Friendly materials inside of the large backpack with cooler, to ensure the frozen snacks or drink not leak after melting

Large Double Decker Backpack Cooler: 1 bottom insulated cooler compartment for your lunch, 1 top storage room for your dry items, 1 front zipper pocket for your personal effects, 2 side mesh pockets for your water bottle; Dimension: 17.7" x 13.0" x 7.5" / 45cm x 33cm x 19cm (L x W x H), Weight: 1.1 pounds / 500g, about 28L, own enough space for all your necessities
BPA FREE : The liner of cooler compartment made from superior quality BPA free material. Perfect companion gear for lunches, beach picnics, park, tail-gating, hiking, camping or backyard use.
